All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Application
Main class of the application that can launch it.
Board
This abstract class represents the game board in the Snake game.
BoardGraphics
The BoardFX class that is responsible for rendering the game board by JavaFX.
Cell
This class represents a cell in the Snake game grid.
Configuration
Configuration file of the game settings.
Direction
This enum represents the direction that a game sprite can move in this game.
Fruit
This abstract class represents a fruit sprite in the Snake game.
FruitGraphics
The FruitFX that is responsible for rendering the fruit using JavaFX.
Game
This class represents the Snake game objects.
GameController
The GameController class is responsible for managing user input and updating the Snake game.
GameGraphics
The GameFX class.
GameState
This enum represents the different possible states of the Snake game.
ImageProcessor
The ImageProcessor that is responsible for processing images and creating image views.
Menu
Class for the game menu.
MenuController
Controller class for the game menu.
PauseMenu
Pause menu class.
PauseMenuController
Controller class for the pause menu.
Snake
This abstract class represents a snake sprite in the Snake game.
SnakeGame
The SnakeGame class that manages the game logic and rendering.
SnakeGameController
Controller for the game itself.
SnakeGraphics
The SnakeFX class that is responsible for rendering the snake's body and head using JavaFX.
Sprite
This interface represents a game sprite in the Snake game.
Wall
Wall model for the snake game.
WallGraphics
Implements the abstract class Wall.
